author: malcolm
msg: Fix checkouts of a single URL-with-peg-revision to check out into a
directory based on the basename of the URL without the peg-revision.
(i.e. make 'svn co http://../trunk@1234' create a directory called
(Checkouts with more than one target URL do this already.)
(svn_cl__checkout): If passed a single URL target, discard any peg
revision present before determining the base directory name.

author: cmpilato
msg: Expose some of the rather useful svn_path.h functions via the SWIG
Include svn_path_h.swg, and explicitly name all the svn_path
functions, ignoring most, but including a few that could be really

author: malcolm
msg: Fix blame for files whose translated eol-style differs from the
untranslated style.  For example, files with an eol-style of 'native'
name of the translated version of the prior revision.
(window_handler): Call add_file_blame() with the name of the
translated version of the prior revision, rather than the untranslated
version.  Set frb->last_filename to the untranslated version of
the current revision, rather than the translated version (important
because this will be the delta source for the next revision), and
instead set frb->last_filename_translated to the translated version.
